support.title: Answer the Call
support.descp:
Pledge here if you want to add your voice to Vlahnya's chorus as she Inspires Revolution!
INCLUDES:
Tier Specific Discord Tag

support.title: Add-Ons Only Tier
support.descp:
This tier is for Backers who only want our add-ons, such as our Level Up Dice, Campaign Coins, Full-Color Miniatures, Wyrmwood, and more!
All of our add-ons are selectable after you pledge $1 (which is credited to your shipping via our Pledge Manager).
INCLUDES:
Shipping Calculated in Pledge Manager

support.title: Digital - PDF Edition
support.descp:
You will receive the Digital PDF Edition of Sirens: Battle of the Bards fulfilled by DriveThruRPG and our full, high resolution, downloadable Map Pack.
INCLUDES:
Sirens: Battle of the Bards Digital Edition - PDF & Map Pack

support.title: Digital - Roll20
support.descp:
In addition to the Digital PDF, you also receive the Roll20 Edition of Sirens: Battle of the Bards.
INCLUDES:
Sirens: Battle of the Bards Digital Edition - Roll20
Sirens: Battle of the Bards Digital Edition - PDF & Map Pack

support.title: Digital - Fantasy Grounds
support.descp:
In addition to the Digital PDF, you also receive the Fantasy Grounds version of Sirens: Battle of the Bards.
INCLUDES:
Sirens: Battle of the Bards Digital Edition - Fantasy Grounds
Sirens: Battle of the Bards Digital Edition - PDF & Map Pack

support.title: Digital - Foundry VTT
support.descp:
In addition to the Digital PDF, you also receive the Foundry VTT version of Sirens: Battle of the Bards.
INCLUDES:
Sirens: Battle of the Bards Digital Edition - Foundry VTT
Sirens: Battle of the Bards Digital Edition - PDF & Map Pack

support.title: Digital - Shard Tabletop
support.descp:
In addition to the Digital PDF, you also receive the Shard Tabletop version of Sirens: Battle of the Bards.
INCLUDES:
Sirens: Battle of the Bards Digital Edition - Shard Tabletop
Sirens: Battle of the Bards Digital Edition - PDF & Map Pack

support.title: Hardcover - Standard Edition
support.descp:
Our 300+ Page "Standard Edition Hardcover" comes with a Full-Color Matte & Gloss Cover with large Spot UV Highlights.
INCLUDES:
Sirens: Battle of the Bards - Standard Edition Hardcover
Sirens: Battle of the Bards Digital Edition - PDF & Map Pack
Shipping Calculated in Pledge Manager

support.title: Hardcover - Special Edition Foil
support.descp:
Our 300+ Page "Special Edition Hardcover" comes with a two-color Foil Stamped cover image on specialty Tungston Metal-X Hammered cover material.
INCLUDES:
Sirens: Battle of the Bards - Special Edition Hardcover
Sirens: Battle of the Bards Digital Edition - PDF & Map Pack
Your Name in the Book's Credits
Shipping Calculated in Pledge Manager

support.title: Retailer Pledge
support.descp:
This tier is a deposit for retailers and provides access to a separate pledge manager. See the "Retailers" section in our FAQ for more details. If we are unable to verify you as a retailer, your deposit will not be refunded.
INCLUDES:
Deposit for BRICK & MORTAR RETAIL Manager
Shipping Calculated in Pledge Manager

support.title: LIMITED EDITON w/ GM Screen & Slipcase
support.descp:
SIGNED & NUMBERED BY SATINE PHOENIX!
Our 300+ Page "Limited Edition Hardcover" comes with a two-color Foil Stamped image on specialty Tungsten Metal-X Hammered cover material & Glossy Game Master's Screen. Both are nestled inside an exclusive two-tone Foil Stamped Slipcase on specialty Tungsten Metal-X Hammered cover material!
INCLUDES:
Sirens: Battle of the Bards - Limited w/ GM Screen & Slipcase
Sirens: Battle of the Bards Digital Edition - PDF & Map Pack
Your Name in the Book's Credits
Shipping Calculated in Pledge Manager

support.title: Adventurer's Pack
support.descp:
A nice starter pack that includes the essentials needed to play so you can get "rolling into Salvata."
INCLUDES:
Sirens: Battle of the Bards Digital Edition - PDF & Map Pack
Sirens: Battle of the Bards - Special Edition Hardcover
Dice - Full Set Straight Edge Resin w/ White Wisp & Gold Flakes
Wyrmwood Personal Dice Tray: Cherry
Shipping Calculated in Pledge Manager

support.title: Treasure Chest
support.descp:
A collector's dream! Everything you need to enjoy this adventure in style!
INCLUDES:
Sirens: Battle of the Bards Digital Edition - PDF & Map Pack
Sirens: Battle of the Bards - Limited w/ GM Screen & Slipcase
Your Name in the Book's Credits
Coin of Salvata - Five Pack of Campaign Coins (Multicolored)
Minis - Kickstarter Exclusive 6 Pack of Full-Color Miniatures
Wyrmwood Personal Dice Tray: Cherry
Wyrmwood Master Vault: Cherry
Dice - Full Set of CUSTOM SHAPED Bard Dice in White Resin
Shipping Calculated in Pledge Manager

support.title: Dragon Hoard
support.descp:
Nearly everything we have to offer and fully upgraded! For the true contour who settles for nothing less than the best!
INCLUDES:
Sirens: Battle of the Bards Digital Edition - PDF & Map Pack
Sirens: Battle of the Bards - Limited w/ GM Screen & Slipcase

Minis - Kickstarter Exclusive 6 Pack of Full-Color Miniatures

support.title: Your Custom Character in the Book!
support.descp:
Be part of the story!
With this tier, you will coordinate with Satine Phoenix, Jamison Stone, and Apotheosis Studios to officially flesh out your character within Sirens: Battle of the Bards with a 500-word bio AND your character's full-color portrait will be featured in the book!
INCLUDES:
Sirens: Battle of the Bards Digital Edition - PDF & Map Pack
Sirens: Battle of the Bards - Limited w/ GM Screen & Slipcase
Your Name in the Book's Credits
Your Custom Character in the Book!
Shipping Calculated in Pledge Manager

support.title: 6-Hour In Person Game w Satine & Jamison
support.descp:
On July 31st, come join Satine Phoenix and Jamison Stone in their home in Boulder, Colorado for a totally unique and custom-designed 6-hour, in-person, game of Dungeons and Dragons. Experience Salvata where it was created -- in the couples' epic game room which includes 7.1 surround-sound for our epic soundtrack!
Travel and housing not included, however, Satine and Jamison will be serving lunch, dinner, and snacks! For those unable to attend in person, you can still play in our game virtually!
INCLUDES:
6-Hour In Person Game with Satine & Jamison in CO - July 31st
Sirens: Battle of the Bards - Limited w/ GM Screen & Slipcase
Sirens: Battle of the Bards Digital Edition - PDF & Map Pack
Your Name in the Book's Credits
Dice - Full Set of CUSTOM SHAPED Bard Dice in White Resin
Shipping Calculated in Pledge Manager

support.title: Your Custom Sidequest in the Book!
support.descp:
Be part of the story!
With this tier, you will coordinate with Satine Phoenix, Jamison Stone, and Apotheosis Studios to not only flesh out your character within Sirens: Battle of the Bards, but we will also create an expanded 4000-word sidequest and location to match your character's story and background with (2) full-color images and (3) sketches!
INCLUDES:
Sirens: Battle of the Bards Digital Edition - PDF & Map Pack
Sirens: Battle of the Bards - Limited w/ GM Screen & Slipcase
Your Name in the Book's Credits
Your Custom Character in the Book!
Your Custom Sidequest in the Book!
Shipping Calculated in Pledge Manager
